title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The issue involves excessive flashing in the Control Example, and the cause is unclear.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it is observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
EB: Upon resizing the window in the vertical direction, the expected behavior is that tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should resize smoothly without excessive flashing.
SR:
1. Launch the control example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe excessive flashing in all tabs of the TabFolder and Frames.
